layout.name: speedX
layout.title: Horizontal Speed
layout.tooltip: How fast should Toady move horizontally while jumping?

layout.name: maxHops
layout.title: Max Hops
layout.tooltip: How many hops will Toady do before turning around? 0 for infinite.

layout.name: hopCooldown
layout.title: Hop Cooldown
layout.tooltip: How many ticks will Toady wait before jumping again?

layout.name: lickRange
layout.title: Lick Range
layout.tooltip:
How close should the player be for Toady to lick?
32 is one tile, 64 is two tiles etc.

layout.name: tongueRange
layout.title: Tongue Range
layout.tooltip:
How far should Toady's tongue reach?
32 is one tile, 64 is two tiles etc.

layout.name: tongueCooldown
layout.title: Lick Cooldown
layout.tooltip: How many ticks will Toady wait before licking?

layout.name: tongueSpeed
layout.title: Lick Speed
layout.tooltip:
How fast should Toady lick?
Acts as a multiplier.

layout.name: alwaysLick
layout.title: Always Lick
layout.tooltip: Should Toady always lick after a jump, even if there is no player near it?

layout.name: segmentedLick
layout.title: Segmented Tongue
layout.tooltip:
Should Toady's tongue extend segmented or smoothly?
Checked is segmented, unchecked is smoothly.
May look weird on slower speeds.
